thread.title: Bernie Sanders: I Wouldn't Be As Naive As Obama
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders: I Wouldn't Be As Naive As Obama

author: Susie Madrak
title: Bernie Sanders: I Wouldn't Be As Naive As Obama
text:
posted on Mike's Blog Round Up becauseofjunk â€¢ 18 sec ago 
"I do hope they keep icing him out because it will cause more agita between the conservative talking heads, who are battling for supremacy in the GOP." 
This is Goldwater strategy in 21st century. It failed then, will fail again. 
I've said it before, I will say it again. Cruz isn't running for president. I do not know what his angle is, but it is not to secure the Presidency and yes, even in TX his reign will wane. 
My "Young Outsiders" (my children) although we do not agree on some things, are motivated to vote next year. And it will not be for Cruz or Paul. Shoot they have my husband, who has libertarian leanings, of seriously considering Bernie.
